_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Open World
author: josdekurk@gmail.com
description: A Free Multiplayer Mod For Rimworld

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt -y install curl wget git zip unzip jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "LinuxX64.zip" || echo "ARMX64.zip")

LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/TastyLollipop/OpenWorld/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/TastyLollipop/OpenWorld/releases")

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${ARCH})
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i ${ARCH})
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url)
    fi
fi
echo -e "Downloading game server files"
wget ${DOWNLOAD_URL} -O files.zip

echo -e "Installing game server files"
unzip files.zip

rm files.zip

chmod +x "Open World Server"

mkdir -p /mnt/server/Mods
mkdir -p /mnt/server/"Whitelisted Mods"
cd /tmp
echo -e "Downloading DLC files"
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TastyLollipop/OpenWorld/main/Server%20Extras/Core%20%26%20DLCs.zip -O dlc.zip
echo -e "Installing DLC files"
unzip dlc.zip
rm dlc.zip
mv Core/ /mnt/server/Mods
mv Royalty/ /mnt/server/"Whitelisted Mods"
mv Ideology/ /mnt/server/"Whitelisted Mods"

cd /mnt/server
FILE=/mnt/server/"Server Settings.txt"
if [ -f "$FILE" ]; then
    echo "config already exists."
else 
    echo "Config does not exist, making one"
 echo -n "- Server Details -
Server Name: My Server Name
Server Description: My Server Description
Server Local IP: 0.0.0.0
Server Port: ${SERVER_PORT}
Max Players: 300
Allow Dev Mode: False
Use Whitelist: False

- Mod System Details -
Use Modlist Match: True
Use Modlist Config Match (WIP): False
Force Mod Verification: False

- Chat System Details -
Use Chat: True
Use Profanity filter: True

- Wealth System Details -
Use Wealth System: False
Wealth Warning Threshold: 10000
Wealth Ban Threshold: 100000

- Idle System Details -
Use Idle System: True
Idle Threshold (days): 7

- Road System Details -
Use Road System: True
Aggressive Road Mode (WIP): False
" > "Server Settings.txt"
fi

echo "done"
